code: var LOCALE="en-US";function getDateString(date){var dateObj=new Date(date);var day=dateObj.getDate();var month=dateObj.toLocaleString(LOCALE,{month:"long"});var year=dateObj.getFullYear();return"".concat(day," ").concat(month," ").concat(year);}function getDateStringWithWeekday(date){var dateObj=new Date(date);var weekday=dateObj.toLocaleString(LOCALE,{weekday:"long"});var monthday=dateObj.getDate();var month=dateObj.toLocaleString(LOCALE,{month:"long"});var year=dateObj.getFullYear();return"".concat(weekday,", ").concat(monthday," ").concat(month," ").concat(year);}function getISODateString(date){return date.toISOString().slice(0,10);}export{getDateString,getDateStringWithWeekday,getISODateString};
